item.title: New Ear Training Regime
item.description: At the beginning of the year, I had a really bad ear. I found it difficult if not impossible to learn to play things by ear. Any ear training that I'd ever attempted felt difficult or fruitless. Now, I've written software to generate music flash cards for myself, which I've dubbed 'Owl', and have embarked on a new ear training regime. So far it feels incredibly enjoyable and productive! Motivation When learning a language one school of thought is to, rather than relying on learning list of grammar rules, is to just learn a lot of sentences.
